title: Entity Type Source
description: Definition for an entity type source, which provide a set of fields and can be joined with other sources

type.description: Type of source. Valid values are db, entity-type

alias.description: Alias of this source to be used in query/later joins

name.description: Name of this source. If set, this will override any source name translations

joinedViaEntityType.description: [Internal use only, should not be included in definitions] The owning entity's alias, if this source's joining is handled by a parent entity in a cross-entity join

order.description: Order of the inherited fields from this source, relative to the fields from other sources. Defaults to 1073741823 (INT_MAX/2)
